case.title: BBW Thinking Of A Number from one to 100 if yoou guess Right You Get - 54 (Brooklyn)
case.text:
i promise i wont lie dont waste time picking 69 or 1 0r ioo good luck boys 1-100
if you guess right you get it
a hot date i am 54 and beautiful and modest trust me this is one date you want to win BLONDE BOMBSHELL you can win me for a friend who likes chubby girls 195lbs but like Karen said to henry in GOOD FELLAS its gonna cost ya
